Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Ill creatures threaten travelers and villagers in Scythera Fae. We must thin their numbers to keep the people safe.

Kill {@LinkCreature:54#270#rampant ghilliedhus}, {@LinkCreature:54#120#bloodhorn mugatos}, {@LinkCreature:54#150#gutripper sabertooths}, and {@LinkCreature:54#440#feral poporis}.

Report to Gillian at Scythera Fae when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
